February 27, 1967
fL
Mr. Jack M. Burke
Office of Extension Radio and Television
Kansas State University
Manhattan, Kansas 66502
Dear Mr. Burke:
Let me acknowledge and thank you for your letter of February
22nd. Mrs. Mosher has briefed me on your recent visit to
our office with regard to Educational Radio, and has passed
along the material you left with her. I appreciate your
furnishing me with this information, and you may be sure
that I will have it in my file for ready reference when this
issue comes before our House Interstate and Foreign Commerce
for consideration.
With kindest regards, I am
Sincerelv,
7 —TSuTTT
JOHN JARMAN, M. C.
